settings.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Settings
settings.soundEnabledHint: Enable or disable all game sounds
settings.shipLasersHint: Disable to reduce lag (only your clicks will fire lasers)
settings.damageNumbersHint: Disable to improve performance (damage still applies)

boss.warning: A massive alien entity blocks your progress!
boss.details: This enemy is larger and much more powerful!
boss.ready: You cannot level up until this boss is defeated!

ascension.title: üåü ASCENSION üåü
ascension.description: Ascend to a higher plane of existence. You will lose all progress except:
ascension.gain: You will gain Prestige Points to unlock permanent bonuses!
ascension.confirm: Are you sure you want to ascend? All non-permanent progress will be reset!

debug.title: üõ†Ô∏è Admin Debug Panel
debug.toggleHint: Press Ctrl + D to toggle this panel

versionSplash.enemyTypesDesc: Guardian deflects click damage while Hoarder guarantees loot. Emoji tags instantly show each perk.
versionSplash.combatBalanceDesc: Ship shots now deal the same base damage as clicks, keeping every hit consistent.
versionSplash.rareLootDesc: Hoarder spawn rate reduced 10√ó so guaranteed power-ups feel truly special.
versionSplash.uiOverlaysDesc: Minimal badges and unique overlays make every special alien readable at a glance.
versionSplash.thankYou: Thanks for testing! Let us know how the new enemy variety feels.

ship.name: üöÄ Starship Fleet
ship.description: Recruit another starship to your armada. Each ship fires independently, adding to your total DPS. More ships = more simultaneous attacks!

attackSpeed.name: ‚ö° Attack Speed
attackSpeed.description: Upgrade targeting computers to fire faster. Speed is everything.

pointMultiplier.name: üíé Damage Amplifier
pointMultiplier.description: Boost all per-hit damage (clicks and ships deal the same amplified damage).

critChance.name: ‚ú® Critical Strike
critChance.description: Master the perfect critical hit. Only affects your clicks (fleet ships cannot crit). Maximum destruction efficiency. Very satisfying.

resourceGen.name: üè≠ Passive Income
resourceGen.description: Automated alien elimination stations. They generate Points (currency) continuously while you play. Very efficient defense system.

xpBoost.name: üìö Knowledge Core
xpBoost.description: Learn advanced alien elimination techniques. Knowledge is power. Especially when eliminating.

mutationEngine.name: üß¨ Mutation Engine
mutationEngine.description: Evolve beyond limits - unlock transformative abilities

energyCore.name: ‚ö° Energy Core
energyCore.description: Harness pure energy - boost all systems

cosmicKnowledge.name: üåå Cosmic Knowledge
cosmicKnowledge.description: Understand the universe - reduces ALL upgrade costs (including post-ascension prestige upgrades). Wisdom is power.

misc.name: üî¨ Research & Development
misc.description: Unlock experimental technologies and forbidden knowledge.

death_pact.name: Death Pact Agreement
death_pact.flavor: Signed contract guarantees "hostile" alien supply chain. Very convenient.

laser_focusing.name: Laser Focusing Crystals
laser_focusing.flavor: These crystals make the aliens make a very satisfying *pop* sound when destroyed.

coffee_machine.name: Crew Coffee Machine
coffee_machine.flavor: Crew stays awake for 24/7 defense operations. The aliens are coming. Definitely coming.

quantum_targeting.name: Quantum Targeting Array
quantum_targeting.flavor: Precise targeting ensures maximum... elimination efficiency. The paperwork checks out.

lucky_dice.name: Lucky Space Dice
lucky_dice.flavor: Rolled a 7! These dice ensure maximum alien destruction rates. The invasion pays... wait.

energy_recycling.name: Energy Recycling System
energy_recycling.flavor: Recycle alien material for maximum efficiency. Very environmentally conscious defense operation.

overclocked_reactors.name: Overclocked Reactors
overclocked_reactors.flavor: Overclock reactors beyond safety limits. Defense emergencies require... creative solutions.

ship_swarm.name: Swarm Intelligence Protocol
ship_swarm.flavor: Fleet coordinates synchronized attacks. The aliens never stand a chance. Especially these ones.

neural_link.name: Neural Link Interface
neural_link.flavor: Neural link directly to your trigger finger. Click faster, eliminate faster. Very efficient.

space_pizza.name: Intergalactic Pizza Delivery
space_pizza.flavor: Keep crews fed during extended defense operations. Happy workers eliminate aliens better.

rubber_duck.name: Debugging Rubber Duck
rubber_duck.flavor: Explains your problems back to you. Very therapeutic.

falafel_rollo_special.name: Falafel Rollo Special
falafel_rollo_special.flavor: The aliens can't resist the delicious smell, making them pause mid-attack. The secret ingredient is... well, we're not entirely sure, but it works! Warning: may cause space indigestion.

antimatter_rounds.name: Antimatter Ammunition
antimatter_rounds.flavor: Antimatter makes the aliens pop twice as satisfyingly. Very therapeutic for stress relief.

motivational_posters.name: Motivational Posters
motivational_posters.flavor: "Hang in there!" says the cat dangling from a satellite dish.

disco_ball.name: Hypnotic Disco Ball
disco_ball.description: Aliens confused, +15% all stats, +5% attack speed
disco_ball.flavor: The aliens can't resist the disco beat. They line up perfectly for... elimination.

ai_optimizer.name: AI Optimization Subroutines
ai_optimizer.flavor: The AI promises it won't become self-aware. Probably.

lucky_horseshoe.name: Lucky Horseshoe
lucky_horseshoe.flavor: Who needs horses in space? Apparently, luck does.

perfect_precision.name: Perfect Precision Arrays
perfect_precision.flavor: Every shot finds its mark. Every. Single. One.

arcade_machine.name: Retro Arcade Machine
arcade_machine.flavor: Plays Pac-Man while generating infinite energy. Science!

void_channeling.name: Void Energy Channeling
void_channeling.flavor: The void stares back. It approves of your... efficient defense operations.

chaos_emeralds.name: Seven Chaos Emeralds
chaos_emeralds.flavor: Gotta go fast! Wait, wrong franchise...

time_machine.name: Malfunctioning Time Machine
time_machine.flavor: Sets time forward, backward, and sideways. Results may vary.

nanobots.name: Self-Replicating Nanobots
nanobots.flavor: They multiply. They evolve. They pay dividends.

plasma_matrix.name: Plasma Energy Matrix
plasma_matrix.flavor: Harness the power of contained supernovas.

holographic_decoys.name: Holographic Decoy System
holographic_decoys.flavor: One ship becomes many. Confusion intensifies.

temporal_acceleration.name: Temporal Acceleration Field
temporal_acceleration.description: All ships gain about +40% attack speed
temporal_acceleration.flavor: Time is relative. Especially when you control it.

quantum_entanglement.name: Quantum Entanglement Core
quantum_entanglement.flavor: Spooky action at a distance. Einstein hated it. You'll love it.

philosophers_stone.name: Philosopher's Stone
philosophers_stone.flavor: Turns lead into gold. And boredom into... productivity. Very efficient.

stellar_forge.name: Stellar Forge
stellar_forge.flavor: Where stars are born, and enemies meet their end.

golden_goose.name: Quantum Golden Goose
golden_goose.flavor: Lays golden eggs. In multiple dimensions. Simultaneously.

dark_matter_engine.name: Dark Matter Engine
dark_matter_engine.description: Passive generation x3, Ships gain about +14% attack speed
dark_matter_engine.flavor: 95% of the universe is dark matter. Now it's yours.

infinity_gauntlet.name: Infinity Gauntlet (Replica)
infinity_gauntlet.description: All stats +40%, ships fire about +20% faster
infinity_gauntlet.flavor: Perfectly balanced, as all things should be. Also, not trademarked.

nebula_harvester.name: Nebula Energy Harvester
nebula_harvester.flavor: Siphon energy from the cosmic clouds themselves.

alien_cookbook.name: Alien Recipe Book
alien_cookbook.flavor: "To Serve Aliens" - A cookbook! Wait, what? These are definitely hostile aliens, right?

hyper_reactor.name: Hyper-Dimensional Reactor
hyper_reactor.flavor: Powers drawn from dimensions we can't even see.

fleet_command_center.name: Fleet Command Center
fleet_command_center.flavor: Centralized coordination multiplies fleet effectiveness. Every ship fires in perfect harmony.

quantum_singularity.name: Quantum Singularity Core
quantum_singularity.description: All Damage x1.3, Passive Gen x1.2
quantum_singularity.flavor: A singularity that defies all known physics. Very convenient.

armada_command.name: Armada Command Center
armada_command.description: Fleet damage x1.2, Ships fire 15% faster
armada_command.flavor: Command an armada worthy of legends. Every ship a legend.

chronos_accelerator.name: Chronos Accelerator
chronos_accelerator.description: Attack speed x1.4, Time flows faster
chronos_accelerator.flavor: Time itself accelerates. Everything dies faster.

perfect_critical.name: Perfect Critical Mastery
perfect_critical.flavor: Every hit finds the perfect weak point. Perfection achieved.

infinite_knowledge.name: Infinite Knowledge Core
infinite_knowledge.description: XP gain x2.5, Knowledge transcends limits
infinite_knowledge.flavor: All knowledge flows through you. You become knowledge itself.

nuclear_reactor.name: Pocket Nuclear Reactor
nuclear_reactor.flavor: Fits in your pocket. Do not put in pocket.

photon_amplifier.name: Photon Wave Amplifier
photon_amplifier.flavor: Light speed is too slow. We're going to ludicrous speed!

reality_anchor.name: Reality Anchor
reality_anchor.flavor: Keep reality in check. Or break it. Your choice.

cosmic_battery.name: Cosmic Energy Battery
cosmic_battery.flavor: Stores the energy of dying stars. Batteries not included.

singularity_core.name: Singularity Power Core
singularity_core.flavor: A black hole in a box. What could be safer?

cheat_codes.name: Cheat Code Manual
cheat_codes.flavor: Up, Up, Down, Down, Left, Right, Left, Right, B, A, Start.

dragon_egg.name: Dragon Egg
dragon_egg.flavor: It's either a dragon egg or a really angry space chicken.

universe_map.name: Map of the Universe
universe_map.flavor: You are here. So is everything else. Helpful!

answer_to_everything.name: Answer to Everything
answer_to_everything.flavor: It's 42. But what was the question again?

heart_of_galaxy.name: Heart of the Galaxy
heart_of_galaxy.flavor: The galaxy had a heart. HAD.

cosmic_ascension.name: Cosmic Ascension Protocol
cosmic_ascension.flavor: Transcend mortal limitations. Become the click itself.

meaning_of_life.name: Meaning of Life
meaning_of_life.description: Unlock prestige system & all stats x2
meaning_of_life.flavor: The answer is 42. But what was the question?

master_clicker.name: Master Clicker
master_clicker.flavor: Click with the power of a thousand suns. Or at least a few.

click_multiplier.name: Click Multiplier Matrix
click_multiplier.flavor: One click. Triple the destruction. Math checks out.

super_clicker.name: Super Clicker Ultimate
super_clicker.description: Clicks deal 5x damage and grant bonus XP
super_clicker.flavor: The ultimate clicking experience. Maximum satisfaction guaranteed.

multiversal_matrix.name: Multiversal Probability Matrix
multiversal_matrix.flavor: Draw power from infinite parallel realities. All of them.

entropy_reversal.name: Entropy Reversal Engine
entropy_reversal.flavor: Heat death? Not on your watch.

omniscient_ai.name: Omniscient AI Core
omniscient_ai.flavor: Knows everything. Destroys everything. Still not self-aware. Probably.

big_bang_generator.name: Big Bang Generator
big_bang_generator.description: All damage x10, Creates universes per hit
big_bang_generator.flavor: Recreate the birth of the universe. For fun.

dimensional_collapse.name: Dimensional Collapse Weapon
dimensional_collapse.flavor: Collapse dimensions. Break reality. Win game.

reality_compiler.name: Reality Compiler
reality_compiler.flavor: If reality is a program, you just optimized it.

akashic_records.name: Akashic Records Access
akashic_records.description: XP x10, Retain all knowledge between lives
akashic_records.flavor: Access the universal library. Read the manual.

void_heart.name: Heart of the Void
void_heart.flavor: The void stares back. You stare harder.

omega_protocol.name: Omega Protocol: Final Form
omega_protocol.flavor: This isn't even my final form. Wait, yes it is.

infinity_engine.name: Infinity Engine
infinity_engine.flavor: Infinity contained in a box. Do not open.

universe_seed.name: Universe Seed
universe_seed.description: Plant new universes: All gains x100
universe_seed.flavor: Water daily. Harvest in 13.8 billion years.

transcendence.name: True Transcendence
transcendence.description: Ascend beyond ascension: Prestige points x2

adaptive_evolution.name: Adaptive Evolution
adaptive_evolution.description: +5% all damage, adapts to enemy types
adaptive_evolution.flavor: Survival of the fittest. You are the fittest.

symbiotic_weapons.name: Symbiotic Weapons
symbiotic_weapons.description: +8% all damage, weapons evolve with use
symbiotic_weapons.flavor: Your weapons are alive. And hungry.

hive_mind.name: Hive Mind Connection
hive_mind.flavor: We are many. We are one.

eldritch_evolution.name: Eldritch Evolution
eldritch_evolution.flavor: You have seen beyond the veil. It stares back.

cosmic_horror.name: Cosmic Horror
cosmic_horror.flavor: That is not dead which can eternal lie...

transcendent_form.name: Transcendent Form
transcendent_form.flavor: You are no longer bound by flesh.

living_weapon.name: Living Weapon
living_weapon.description: +100% all damage, you ARE the weapon

apex_predator.name: Apex Predator
apex_predator.description: +150% all damage, top of the food chain

fusion_reactor.name: Fusion Reactor
fusion_reactor.flavor: The power of the sun, in your hands.

zero_point.name: Zero Point Energy
zero_point.flavor: Harvest energy from the quantum foam.

perpetual_motion.name: Perpetual Motion Machine
perpetual_motion.flavor: Physics professors hate this one trick!

arc_reactor.name: Arc Reactor
arc_reactor.flavor: Proof that you have a heart. A mechanical one.

harvested_star.name: Harvested Star
harvested_star.flavor: You plucked a star from the sky. Now it works for you.

vacuum_energy_tap.name: Vacuum Energy Tap
vacuum_energy_tap.flavor: Siphon energy from the fabric of space.

entropy_reversal_engine.name: Entropy Reversal Engine
entropy_reversal_engine.description: About +60% attack speed, time flows backward
entropy_reversal_engine.flavor: Heat death? Not on your watch.

big_crunch_generator.name: Big Crunch Generator
big_crunch_generator.description: About +100% attack speed, reverse the universe

multiversal_tap.name: Multiversal Energy Tap
multiversal_tap.description: Attack speed x2.8 (~+185%), infinite parallel power

ancient_texts.name: Ancient Texts
ancient_texts.flavor: The wisdom of civilizations long dead.

prophetic_vision.name: Prophetic Vision
prophetic_vision.description: -3.5% all costs, +20% XP, see the future

universal_translator.name: Universal Translator
universal_translator.flavor: Understand all languages. Even alien ones.

forbidden_theorems.name: Forbidden Theorems
forbidden_theorems.flavor: Knowledge that breaks minds. Very efficient.

schrodinger_upgrade.name: Schr√∂dinger's Upgrade
schrodinger_upgrade.flavor: Both exists and doesn't exist. Both cheaper and more powerful.

universal_constants.name: Universal Constants Manipulator
universal_constants.flavor: Change the fundamental laws. Just a little.

dimensional_rift.name: Dimensional Rift
dimensional_rift.flavor: A tear in reality. Don't put your finger in it.

void_prism.name: Void Prism
void_prism.description: Gain 0.0001% of Passive Gen as Base Click Damage
void_prism.flavor: Refracts void energy into raw power. Your idle engines now fuel your attacks.

chronal_dust.name: Chronal Dust
chronal_dust.flavor: Time residue. Snort it for knowledge. (Don't actually snort it).

entropy_injector.name: Entropy Injector
entropy_injector.flavor: Accelerates the heat death of the universe, one click at a time.

temporal_siphon.name: Temporal Siphon
temporal_siphon.flavor: Steals time from the future. Interest rates are astronomical.

event_horizon_shield.name: Event Horizon Shield
event_horizon_shield.flavor: If light can't escape, neither can the aliens.

cosmic_filament.name: Cosmic Filament
cosmic_filament.flavor: The nervous system of the universe.

null_space_projector.name: Null Space Projector
null_space_projector.flavor: Projects non-existence onto targets. Very effective.

omega_relay.name: Omega Relay
omega_relay.flavor: The final connection before ascension. Power overwhelming.
